title: St Margaret of Scotland Novena
description: St Margaret of Scotland was and English princess and Scottish queen who lived in the eleventh century. Pray this novena for Scotland, mothers, large families, learning, and the poor.

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Heavenly Father, Thou adorned Queen Margaret of Scotland with virtue and with great love for the poor. Her speech was salted with wisdom, her silent thoughts were virtuous and holy, her whole life a pattern of virtue. Lend Thy ear to the intercessions of this holy woman and help us to live after her example, and especially for the grace we ask (mention request here‚Ä¶) so that Thy goodness and mercy becomes visible in today‚Äôs world. Through our Lord Jesus Christ, your Son, who lives and reigns with Thee in the unity of the Holy Spirit, one God, for ever and ever. Amen.

Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be Saint Margaret of Scotland, pray for us!
